revised_title: On the Differential Equations of Dynamics: A New Method for Solving Simultaneous Partial Differential Equations
tldr: The author presents a new method for solving simultaneous partial differential equations, combining elements of Jacobi's methods and his own previous work on "Simultaneous Differential Equations." This new method allows for the solution of a complete system of partial differential equations, resulting in a common integral of all equations, by integrating a single differential equation.
